trans-unit.source: Specifies the internal execution behavior of a service contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: Angir virkemåten intern kjøring av en servicekontrakten implementering.

trans-unit.source: Apply the ServiceBehaviorAttribute attribute to a service implementation to specify service-wide execution behavior.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ServiceBehaviorAttribute-attributtet for en tjeneste-implementering å angi virkemåten for tjenesteomfattende kjøring.

trans-unit.source: (To specify execution behavior at the method level, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute> attribute.) This attribute can be applied only to service implementations.
trans-unit.target: (For å angi virkemåten for kjøring på nivå metoden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute>attributtet.)</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute> Dette attributtet kan bare brukes på tjenesten implementeringer.

trans-unit.source: For working examples, see the [Service Behaviors Samples](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4e3c6513-a7ff-4b35-8dcf-b5506c6f39a7).
trans-unit.target: Arbeide eksempler i [Service virkemåter eksempler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4e3c6513-a7ff-4b35-8dcf-b5506c6f39a7).

trans-unit.source: ServiceBehaviorAttribute properties are a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model feature that enables common features that developers otherwise have to implement.
trans-unit.target: ServiceBehaviorAttribute er en [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming modellen-funksjon som aktiverer felles funksjoner med utviklere ellers å implementere.

trans-unit.source: For more information about these and other behaviors, see [Specifying Service Run-Time Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om disse og andre virkemåter [angir tjenesten kjøretid virkemåte](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about the underlying runtime properties that some of the following properties set, see [Extending ServiceHost and the Service Model Layer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om egenskapene underliggende kjøretiden at noen av følgende egenskaper sett, kan du se [utvider ServiceHost og tjenesten modellen laget](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A> property specifies the type of filter that the dispatcher system uses to locate the endpoint that handles requests.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A>Egenskapen angir typen filter dispatcher-systemet bruker for å finne endepunktet som behandler forespørsler.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A> property automatically closes the session when the channel is closed and the service has finished processing any remaining messages.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>Egenskapen lukkes automatisk økten når kanalen lukkes, og tjenesten er ferdig med å behandle gjenværende meldinger.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> property controls the internal threading model, enabling support for reentrant or multithreaded services.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>Egenskapen kontrollerer intern trådmodellen, aktivere støtte for innkommende eller flere tråder tjenester.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A> property is used to declare a name for use in the `name` attribute of the `<service>` element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>Egenskapen brukes til å angi et navn for bruk i den `name` for den `<service>` element i en konfigurasjonsfil.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> property enables the run time to ignore extra serialization information that is not required to process the message.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>Egenskapen kan kjøre tid til å ignorere ekstra serialisering informasjonen som ikke kreves for å behandle meldingen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property specifies whether unhandled exceptions in a service are returned as SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>Egenskapen angir om et ubehandlet unntak i en tjenesten blir returnert som SOAP-feil.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is for debugging purposes only.
trans-unit.target: Dette er for feilsøkingsformål bare.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> property specifies whether and when services and their service objects are to be recycled during an exchange with a client.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>Egenskapen angir om og når tjenester og tilhørende serviceobjekter skal resirkuleres i løpet av en exchange-klienter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> property to limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>Egenskapen grensen for antall elementer i en som er serialisert.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A> properties control the name and namespace for the WSDL expression of the service element.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>Og <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A>Egenskaper som styrer navn og navneområde for WSDL-uttrykket for elementet service.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> property specifies whether the service object is recycled when a transaction completes.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>Egenskapen angir om tjenesteobjektet skal resirkuleres når en transaksjon er fullført.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A> property specifies whether outstanding transactions are completed when the session closes.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>Egenskapen angir om utestående transaksjoner blir fullført når økten avsluttes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A> property specifies the transaction isolation level that the contract supports.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A>Egenskapen angir Isolasjonsnivået for transaksjonen som støtter kontrakten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A> property specifies the time period within which a transaction must complete or it aborts.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A>Egenskapen angir hvor lang tid som en transaksjon må fullføres, eller den avbryter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A> property indicates whether to synchronize inbound method calls with the user interface thread automatically.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A>Egenskapen angir om å synkronisere innkommende metodekall med bruker-grensesnittet tråden automatisk.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property informs the system whether it should confirm that SOAP headers marked as `MustUnderstand` have, in fact, been understood.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>Egenskapen informerer systemet om det skal bekrefte at SOAP-topptekster merket som `MustUnderstand` har, faktisk forstår.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property can also be set using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>kan også angi egenskapen ved hjelp av en programmets konfigurasjonsfil.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default values for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> are: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdier den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>er:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>Egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>Er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A> property is the namespace-qualified name of the type without the assembly information.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>Egenskapen er navneområdet kvalifiserte navnet på typen uten samlingsinformasjon.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>Egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> property is set to 64KB.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>Er satt til 64KB.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A> property is the name of the service type, without namespace or assembly information.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>Egenskapen er navnet på tjenestetypen uten navneområde eller samlingen informasjonen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A> property is "http://tempuri.org".
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A>Egenskapen er "http://tempuri.org".</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>Egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> is `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A> is `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>Egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A>Egenskapen er <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>.</xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A>Egenskap er satt til <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>.</xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>Egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"> </xref> som brukes av dispatcher ikke rute innkommende meldinger til riktig sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> object that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"> </xref> objektet som brukes av dispatcher ikke rute innkommende meldinger til riktig sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to automatically close a session when a client closes an output session.
trans-unit.target: Angir om å lukke automatisk en økt når en klient lukker en output-økt.

trans-unit.source: By default when a client closes an output session and the service has finished processing any remaining messages the server closes the session.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når en klient lukker en output-økt og tjenesten er ferdig med å behandle gjenværende meldinger lukker serveren økten.

trans-unit.source: Setting AutomaticSessionShutdown to `false` prevents the server from automatically closing the session and enables custom control of session lifetimes.
trans-unit.target: Angi AutomaticSessionShutdown til `false` hindrer at serveren automatisk lukke økt og aktiverer egendefinert kontroll for økten levetid.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if services automatically close a session when the client closes an output session; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tjenester automatisk lukker en økt når klienten lukker en output-økt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a service supports one thread, multiple threads, or reentrant calls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om en tjeneste støtter én tråd flere tråder eller innkommende kall.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether an instance of a service can handle one thread or multiple threads that execute concurrently, and if single-threaded, whether reentrancy is supported.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om en forekomst av en tjeneste kan håndtere tråd for én eller flere tråder som kjøres samtidig, og hvis enkelttrådet, om noe støttes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ConcurrencyMode property interacts with some other settings.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For ConcurrencyMode egenskapen samhandler med noen andre innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> value is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the ConcurrencyMode value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>verdien er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>resultatet er at tjenesten kan bare behandle en melding om gangen med mindre du også angi ConcurrencyMode-verdien til <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property also produces behavior in combination with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen også produserer virkemåte sammen med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [økter, Instancing og samtidighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> instructs the system to restrict instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, which frees you from dealing with threading issues.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>til <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>instruerer av systemet for å begrense forekomster av tjenesten til en tråd for utførelse om gangen, som trenger du håndtering av threading problemer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> means that service objects can be executed by multiple threads at any one time.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>betyr at tjeneste objekter kan utføres av flere tråder når som helst.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must ensure thread safety.
trans-unit.target: I så fall må du kontrollere tråd sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> also restricts access to a single thread at a time; while the operation is processing, no other message can enter the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>også begrenser tilgang til én tråd om gangen. mens operasjonen behandler, kan ingen andre melding angi operasjonen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: If during the operation a call to another service leaves, the current message loses the lock on the operation, which is free to process other messages.
trans-unit.target: Hvis under operasjonen forlater et kall til en annen tjeneste, mister gjeldende melding låsen operasjonen som er fri til å behandle andre meldinger.

trans-unit.source: When the service call out returns, the lock is reestablished and the original message can continue processing to its conclusion or until another call out of the operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Når tjenesten fremheve returnerer, låsen er gjenopprettet, og den opprinnelige meldingen kan fortsette behandlingen ferdig eller til et annet kall av operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Even though <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> restricts instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, you must also set <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentCalls%2A> to 1 to guarantee no out-of-order messages.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Selv om <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>begrenser forekomster av en tråd for utførelse samtidig-tjenesten, må du også angi <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentCalls%2A>til 1 for å garantere ingen feil rekkefølge meldinger.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentCalls%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: > > Also, it is your responsibility to leave your object state consistent before callouts and you must confirm that operation-local data is valid after callouts.
trans-unit.target: >> Du må bekrefte at operasjonen lokale data er gyldig etter Bildeforklaring også den er din ansvaret for å forlate objekt tilstand konsekvent før bildeforklaring.

trans-unit.source: Note that the service instance is unlocked only by calling another service over a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] channel.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at tjenesteforekomsten låses bare ved å kalle en annen tjeneste en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kanal.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the called service can reenter the first service via a callback.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan tjenesten kall angi den første tjenesten via en tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: If the first service is not reentrant, the sequence of calls results in a deadlock.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den første tjenesten ikke er innkommende, fører rekkefølge for kall til en vranglås.

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: During any outbound call from a processing operation, data not local to the operation can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Dataene ikke lokale for operasjonen kan endres under en utgående kall fra en behandling-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: (Local state data is guaranteed to be valid when the original message resumes processing.) As a result, before your outbound call you must ensure that non-local data is valid for other incoming calls and revalidate non-local data after the outbound call returns.
trans-unit.target: (Lokal tilstandsdata garanteres skal være gyldig når den opprinnelige meldingen gjenopptar behandling.) Før utgående samtalen må du derfor kontrollere som ikke er lokale data gjelder for andre innkommende samtaler, og Valider ikke er lokale data på nytt etter at utgående kallet returnerer.

trans-unit.source: The following pseudo-code illustrates the required pattern for successful reentrant support.
trans-unit.target: Følgende pseudo koden viser nødvendige mønsteret for vellykkede innkommende støtte.

trans-unit.source: ```c# public void MyMethod() { this.SomeNonLocalDataState; // Here you need to clean nonlocal state for other users OutboundProxy proxy = new OutboundProxy(); int returnValue = proxy.CallOutOfOperation(); // Ensure that this.SomeNonLocalDataState is valid for continued use. this.ModifyNonLocalState; return returnValue; } ``` Using the Begin/End asynchronous call pattern for an outbound call when the ConcurrencyMode is <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> triggers an exception.
trans-unit.target: ```c# public void MyMethod() { this.SomeNonLocalDataState; // Here you need to clean nonlocal state for other users OutboundProxy proxy = new OutboundProxy(); int returnValue = proxy.CallOutOfOperation(); // Ensure that this.SomeNonLocalDataState is valid for continued use. this.ModifyNonLocalState; return returnValue; } ```Ved hjelp av Begin/slutt asynkront kall mønster for en utgående samtale når ConcurrencyMode <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>utløser et unntak.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous outbound calls require an operation in which ConcurrencyMode is <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>, in which case you must handle synchronization issues.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron utgående samtaler krever en operasjon som ConcurrencyMode er <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>, da du må behandle synkroniseringsproblemer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: Generally, if a message arrives for an instance that violates its concurrency mode, the message waits until the instance is available, or until it times out.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, slik at hvis det kommer en melding for en forekomst som ikke oppfyller den samtidighetsmodusen, venter meldingen til forekomsten er tilgjengelig, eller til den blir tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> and a reentrant call is blocked while waiting for the instance to be freed, the system detects the deadlock and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>og en innkommende oppringing er blokkert under venting på forekomsten er frigjort, systemet oppdager i vranglås og oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown at runtime if <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> is `true` when the ConcurrencyMode property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>oppstår under kjøring hvis <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>er `true` når egenskapen ConcurrencyMode er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Note that you must explicitly set <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> to `false` if there is an operation with <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> set to true and you set ConcurrencyMode to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at du må angis eksplisitt <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>til `false` Hvis det er en operasjon med <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName>satt til true, og du WantDestinationQueue ConcurrencyMode <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise a validation exception is thrown because the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en validering unntak fordi standardverdien for <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is an interaction of the ConcurrencyMode and other properties that can alter runtime behavior.
trans-unit.target: Det er en samhandling mellom ConcurrencyMode og andre egenskaper som kan endre virkemåten for kjøring.

trans-unit.source: For a complete description of these interactions, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](../Topic/Sessions,%20Instancing,%20and%20Concurrency.md).
trans-unit.target: For en fullstendig beskrivelse av disse bruk, kan du se [økter, Instancing og samtidighet](../Topic/Sessions,%20Instancing,%20and%20Concurrency.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref> values; the default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"> </xref> verdier; standard er <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value used to locate the service element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som brukes til å finne tjenesteelementet i en programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Use this value to specify a particular service in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne verdien til å angi en bestemt tjeneste i konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The value to locate in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Verdien til å finne i konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the fully qualified type name without assembly information.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er fullstendige navnet på uten samlingsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: The value is null.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er null.

trans-unit.source: The value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service ordered dispatch is ensured.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tjenesten i angitte sikres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the service ordered dispatch is ensured; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis tjenesten i angitte sikres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that implements the service and that is used as the singleton instance of the service, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no singleton instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som implementerer tjenesten, og som brukes som singleton-forekomsten av tjenesten, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ingen singleton-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A non-`null` value provides the service instance to which all messages addressed to the service will be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: En ikke -`null` -verdien angir tjenesteforekomsten som sendes alle meldinger som er adressert til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the service.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to send unknown serialization data onto the wire.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om ukjent serialiseringsdata på nettet sendes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unknown serialization data is never sent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om ukjent serialiseringsdataene sendes aldri; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException%601?displayProperty=fullName> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail?displayProperty=fullName> and sent as a fault message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir at generelle kjøring av et ubehandlet unntak som skal konverteres til en <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException%601?displayProperty=fullName> av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail?displayProperty=fullName> og sendes som en feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: Set this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> only during development to troubleshoot a service.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> bare under utvikling til å feilsøke en tjeneste.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et ubehandlet unntak som skal returneres som SOAP-feil. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates when new service objects are created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som angir når nye tjenesteobjekter som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> property to specify when new service objects are created.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>til å angi når nye tjenesteobjekter som er opprettet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: Because the service object is not directly connected to the communicating channel, the lifetime of the service objects is independent of the lifetime of the channel between a client and the service application.
trans-unit.target: Fordi serviceobjektet ikke er koblet til kommunikasjon kanalen direkte, er levetiden for serviceobjekter uavhengig av levetiden for kanalen mellom en klient og tjenesteprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: The default value, <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>, instructs the service application to create a new service object when a new communication session is established between a client and the service application.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>, angir at tjenesteprogrammet for å opprette et nytt tjenesteobjekt når det opprettes en ny økt for kommunikasjon mellom en klient og tjenesteprogrammet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls in the same session are handled by the same object.
trans-unit.target: Etterfølgende kall i samme økt behandles av det samme objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> indicates that each service object handles requests from one client channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>Angir at hver Webtjenesteobjektet behandler forespørsler fra én klient kanal.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The InstanceContextMode property interacts with some other settings.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For InstanceContextMode egenskapen samhandler med noen andre innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the InstanceContextMode value is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis for eksempel, InstanceContextMode-verdien er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>resultatet er at tjenesten kan bare behandle en melding om gangen med mindre du også angi <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>verdien til <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: This property also produces behavior in combination with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen også produserer virkemåte sammen med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [økter, Instancing og samtidighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For singleton lifetime behavior (for example, if the host application calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.%23ctor%2A> constructor and passes an object to use as the service), the service class must set InstanceContextMode to `Single`, or an exception is thrown at run time.
trans-unit.target: For singleton levetid virkemåte (for eksempel hvis vertsprogrammet kaller den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren, og sender et objekt som brukes som tjenesten), serviceklassen må angitt InstanceContextMode `Single`, eller et unntak under kjøring.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref> values; the default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"> </xref> verdier; standardverdien er <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items allowed in a serialized object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt antall elementer som er tillatt i et serialisert objekt.

trans-unit.source: Use the MaxItemsInObjectGraph property set a limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized.
trans-unit.target: Bruk MaxItemsInObjectGraph-egenskapen angitt en grense for antall elementer i en som er serialisert.

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property using the [\<dataContractSerializer\>](../Topic/%3CdataContractSerializer%3E.md) element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi denne egenskapen ved hjelp av den [ \< system.Runtime.serialization\>](../Topic/%3CdataContractSerializer%3E.md) element i en programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items allowed in an object.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall elementer som er tillatt i et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The default is 65536 bytes (64KB).
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 65536 byte (64KB).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the name attribute in the service element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for attributtet name i tjenesteelementet i Web Services (WSDL = Description Language).

trans-unit.source: The value of the name attribute in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""></xref> element when exported.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for attributtet name i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""> </xref> elementet når eksporteres.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the target namespace for the service in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for målnavneområde for tjenesten i Web Services (WSDL = Description Language).

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref> attribute for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:definitions>" name="<wsdl:definitions>" href=""></xref> element that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""> </xref> attributt den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:definitions>" name="<wsdl:definitions>" href=""> </xref> element som inneholder den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the service object is released when the current transaction completes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om serviceobjektet er utgitt når den gjeldende transaksjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service object is to be released; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis serviceobjektet som skal frigis; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an object that implements the service and that is used as the singleton instance of the service.
trans-unit.target: Angir et objekt som implementerer tjenesten, og som brukes som singleton-forekomsten av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: This provides the service instance to which all messages addressed to the service will be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Dette gir tjenesteforekomsten som sendes alle meldinger som er adressert til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: If SetWellKnownSingleton is set to a non-`null` value, then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> or an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SetWellKnownSingleton er satt til en ikke -`null` verdi, deretter den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>må settes til <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>eller en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The singleton instance of the service.
trans-unit.target: Singleton-forekomsten av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The value set is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: Passes custom data objects to the bindings that support the behavior properties.
trans-unit.target: Sender egendefinerte dataobjekter til bindingene som støtter egenskapene virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Service-endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: The data objects needed by bindings to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Dataobjekter som kreves av bindinger til å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: Customizes the service run time to support the behavior properties.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasser tjenesten kjøretid for å støtte egenskapene virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the service description and service host are capable of supporting the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Bekrefter at tjenestebeskrivelsen og Tjenesteverten er støtter virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether pending transactions are completed when the current session closes without error.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om ventende transaksjoner skal fullføres når den gjeldende økten avsluttes uten feil.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if pending transactions are to be completed when the current session closes without error; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ventende transaksjoner som fullføres når den gjeldende økten avsluttes uten feil. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the transaction isolation level for new transactions created inside the service, and incoming transactions flowed from a client.
trans-unit.target: Angir Isolasjonsnivået for transaksjonen for nye transaksjoner som er opprettet i tjenesten, og innkommende transaksjoner flytes fra en klient.

trans-unit.source: The isolation level in which your transaction runs determines how data is treated when changes are made in other transactions and how long your transaction must hold locks to protect against these changes.
trans-unit.target: Isolasjonsnivået der transaksjonen-kjører avgjør hvordan dataene behandles når endringer i andre transaksjoner og hvor lenge transaksjonen må inneholde låser til å beskytte mot disse endringene.

trans-unit.source: For example, the default value, <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>, specifies that no updating or inserting can occur until the transaction is complete.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel standardverdien <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>, angir at ingen oppdatering eller innsetting kan oppstå før transaksjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to restrict the isolation level of incoming transactions flowed from a client.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan også brukes til å begrense isolation level innkommende transaksjoner flytes fra en klient.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> value that specifies the transaction isolation level.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref> verdi som angir Isolasjonsnivået for transaksjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the period within which a transaction must complete.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir periode som en transaksjon må fullføres.

trans-unit.source: This value sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.TransactionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien angir den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.TransactionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.TransactionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property using the [\<serviceTimeouts\>](../Topic/%3CserviceTimeouts%3E.md) element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi denne egenskapen ved hjelp av den [ \< serviceTimeouts\>](../Topic/%3CserviceTimeouts%3E.md) element i en programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> object that represents the time within which transactions must complete or be automatically aborted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>objektet som representerer som transaksjoner må fullføres eller avbrytes automatisk.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The value is null.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er null.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName> or greater than <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er mindre enn <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName> eller større enn <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil bruke gjeldende synkroniseringskontekst velge tråd for utførelse.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide the user interface thread affinity that some applications require.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen skal kunne tråd affinitet for brukeren grensesnittet, som krever noen programmer.

trans-unit.source: For example, a Windows Forms application may be registered as a singleton service object.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms-program kan for eksempel være registrert som en singleton-tjenesteobjektet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, all calls into the service must run on the Windows Forms thread.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må alle samtaler i tjenesten kjøre på Windows Forms-tråden.

trans-unit.source: The default case, in which UseSynchronizationContext is set to `true`, synchronizes all calls to the service to run on the thread captured from the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard-tilfeller der UseSynchronizationContext er satt til `true`, synkroniserer alle kall til tjenesten til å kjøre på tråd hentet fra <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle kall til tjenesten må kjøre på tråd som er angitt av den <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> header processing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om systemet eller programmet skal SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> hodet behandling.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidateMustUnderstand property to turn off the enforced validation of arriving message headers.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ValidateMustUnderstand-egenskapen til å slå av tvungne valideringen av innkommende meldingshoder.

trans-unit.source: In normal execution, message headers are compared against the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A> property to confirm that arriving headers are explicitly handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: I normal kjøringen meldingshoder sammenlignes med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A>til å bekrefte at innkommende overskrifter behandles eksplisitt av tjenesten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this to `false` to disable this checking.
trans-unit.target: Angi `false` å deaktivere denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, the application must check for headers marked with MustUnderstand="true" and return a fault if one or more of them were not understood.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger `false`, programmet må se etter overskrifter som er merket med MustUnderstand = "true" og returnere en feil hvis én eller flere av dem ikke ble forstått.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the application is supposed to accept any incoming SOAP messages (for example, when using typed or untyped messages) and perform custom header processing.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når programmet skal godta alle innkommende SOAP-meldinger (for eksempel når du bruker skrevet eller ikke-typeangitt meldinger) og utføre egendefinerte overskriften behandling.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system is to perform SOAP header <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> processing; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the application performs this processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis systemet å utføre SOAP-hodet <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> behandling; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at programmet til å utføre denne behandling.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
